user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (mark.thompson@email.com) with some wellness tips. Tell her she can check her NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Wellness Tips Email

Hi Jane,

Mark asked me to reach out. When you have a moment, could you please send an email to him (mark.thompson@email.com) with some wellness tips? Feel free to consult your NotionManager for any relevant information or resources.

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name / Assistant]
